column4: ok, here's the problem:  i have the user account logged on. only 1 user account without root privs. how do i get root privs without them already lol
sorry im nub at ubuntu. i work on windows computers lol
no. i dont have an account so i can do anything that requires admin privs
it took forever to even log in
i had to reset my pass for my account
anytime i want to do anything (almost) it asks for admin privs account password
i dont have one and cannot set
cant make a new account or anything
if you can, ps ax > process-list.txt and pastebin the process-list.txt
actually, pastebin your /etc/sudoers, if you can read it
use a LiveCD to copy the /etc/sudoers from a working Ubuntu install
well there's your problem, hahah. Do you have a working Natty machine elsewhere? I don't know if the LiveCD sudoers is the same or not
long story short, you need to replace your /etc/sudoers. That'll fix your biggest problem by itself.
